AppLamp Python API¶

AppLamp Python API is a library for controlling AppLight lighting from your Python code.

Examples¶

Controlling white light bulbs:

from applight import WhiteLight

light = WhiteLight()
light.on()
light.warmer()
light.fade_out()
light.night_mode(group=1)

Controlling RGB light bulbs:

from applight import ColorLight

light = ColorLight()
light.fade_in()
light.hue(100)  # changing color
light.next_effect()
